name: Tokyo Twilight Ghost Hunters Daybreak: Special Gigs
description: Tokyo Twilight Ghost Hunters is a modern, immersive take on Japanese ghost stories. Go face to face with the ghosts haunting Tokyo, learn why they linger in this world, and banish them!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7/8.1/10 Processor: Core i3 (Haswell) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 2GB (or Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7/8.1/10 (64bit ver) Processor: Core i3 (Skylake) Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c
